commitMessage:
@@@Issue 4625: Renamed directories to new structure.

@@@Handle null destination and source ports.
Use generics.

@@@Add generic types. Remove use of deprecated method.

git-svn-id: http://argouml.tigris.org/svn/argouml/trunk@14774 a161b567-7d1e-0410-9ef9-912c70fedb3f

@@@Complete overhaul of the FigUseCase: it is now less than half the lines of code.
This fixes issues 3964.  3965.  3966.  4595.  5187.
TODO: The extension points compartment separator line is not drawn from ellipse edge to edge.  but only as wide as the widest text in the oval.

git-svn-id: http://argouml.tigris.org/svn/argouml/trunk@17365 a161b567-7d1e-0410-9ef9-912c70fedb3f

@@@Getting rid of the XxxxCompartmentContainer interfaces (according architecture from Bob). Not complete yet.
Added FigCompartmentBox.showCompartment().  so that other classes only need to deal with the Box.  not its contents.
Make the hide/show of the EnumerationsLiteral compartment persist.

git-svn-id: http://argouml.tigris.org/svn/argouml/trunk@17533 a161b567-7d1e-0410-9ef9-912c70fedb3f
